author: Fextralife
description:
Vampire The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 Review - It's NOT What I THOUGHT!
In this Vampire: The Masquerade Bloodlines 2 review, I'm going to be talking about my hands-on impressions with the game. I finished it just a couple of days ago. I'm going to be talking about what I like about the game, what I don't like about the game, how many hours you can get out of it, and whether I think you should pick it up on launch day or not.
